mean_cn: adj.顺从的，惟命是从的，谦恭的
mean_en: too willing to accept somebody else’s authority and willing to obey them without questioning anything they want you to do
sentence: They\u0027re very submissive in front of their king.
sentence_trans: 他们在国王面前很顺从。
word_etyma: sub在下面，次一等 + miss给 + ive形容词后缀 → 在下面给 → submissive恭顺的
